reviews.text: Fantastic sound and fit! I got these during the special Prime sale for $15. I thought for $15 I’d try them…not really needing them or so I thought. I listen in bed a lot with a pair of bone conduction earphones. It does the trick for simple listening to reviews of items and stuff like that but the sound quality is meh. So here are my first impressions. Packaging - this comes in a small box that keeps the earbuds secure and is very easy to open. Once opened you are greeted by very simple instructions that guide you to your Alexa app. Setup - once in the app, it recognizes the earbuds instantly and asks if you want to set them up. I pressed yes and was set up in no time. App - it says that you need an app so I pressed to get that. I was taken to the App Store where I didn’t see an echo buds app but instead the Alexa app that I already had. So I’m not sure if it simply updated the app or what. But it did everything quickly and I was onto the next step. The app is simple to use and lets you adjust the bass, mids and treble - which I instantly used to set it to my preference. I do not like not having an eq for headphones so this was a pleasant surprise. I do wish there were a way to save custom presets so I could quickly change the settings for let’s say pop to classical music. Use - I quickly downloaded Sirius XM and was off to listening to favorite stations in no time ranging from Christian worship to The Beach Boys to Rachmaninoff. The sound was crystal clear and very pleasing. I’m an audio engineering professor and will actually incorporate these into my mixing repertoire as I have the ability to use Bluetooth headphones directly with Pro Tools. These will be perfect to check final mixes on what consumers listen to most now - ear buds. I will toggle between the professional headphones I use and these - which I think will inform my mixing decisions more. Fit - they just fit…this is the first pair of earbuds that I didn’t have to do any Messi by s around with/ just put them on and enjoy…no falling out and they are very comfortable. After wearing them for a few minutes you forget they are on. They can be worn for a long time because of how comfortable they are. Build quality - in addition to seeing professional packaging, it was great to see when I opened it how beautiful the case was. It is sleek and comfortable to hold. Opening the case you are greeted with two stylish earbuds - mine were the black variety. The actual earbuds are very nice looking with a shiny understated black and nice clear silicon that is the many part which grabs the ear Recommendation - I highly recommend these for someone wanting a quality pair of earbuds buds in a decent price range. Even at the full $50 price they are wonderful. I would suspect they compete with earbuds that are more in the $100 range. I will likely compare them to my wife’s AirPods to check differences. I’ve had other EarPods in this price range and I can say these are definitely worlds above. I haven’t even gotten into the phone calling abilities…that next for me to try. But I suspect they will be great for that. They get wonderful reviews from major publishers like PC world. God bless and enjoy your new immersive earbuds!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2025
reviews.title: Fabulous fit and sound - compared to much higher priced buds!

reviews.text: I got these when they first came out and I've had them for about a month now. These are the first wireless earbuds I've ever purchased so I didn't know what to expect but so far I'm pleasantly surprised, especially considering how inexpensive they are. I think the sound is great. I'm not an audiophile by any stretch but I can definitely tell that these have much better sound quality than my wired earbuds. My only complaint from a sound standpoint is occasionally there will be interference or it will cut out. I assume this is just par for the course for something that's wireless / bluetooth, but it can be annoying and there have been a couple of times I needed to reconnect them to clear up an audio problem. It doesn't happen enough for it to be a deal breaker though, and it could just be my phone as it never happens with computer audio. As far as Alexa integration, these work great. I barely have to say "Alexa" above a whisper for the earbuds to activate, which is great when I'm in public and don't want to appear like I'm talking to myself. It also helps if I don't want to trigger one of my nearby Alexa devices, although even if I do, the proximity awareness of echo devices means that if I have my earbuds in, my other echo's won't pick up the command, which is great. From a comfort standpoint, I think my opinion is going to be subjective, after all, everyone's ears are different. I can keep these earbuds in for up to two hours before I need a break. I don't like to keep the earbuds in when I'm not using them so I keep the case in my pocket and take the earbuds out when I'm not using them. That keep my ears from getting tired. I think the battery life is great. Again, I usually only keep them in my ears for around 2 hours, but there have been a couple of times that I've keep them in for 4 to 5 hours and they've almost run completely out of power. In those cases, 15 to 20 minutes in the case and they are good as new. In addition to all this, I really like the features of these earbuds. They were very easy to setup with the Alexa app. They seamlessly connect to my phone and laptop at the same time and I can listen to audio from either device at any time without having to do any type of manual switching. I can be listening to audio on my laptop and if my phone rings, it will pause whatever is playing on my laptop to give me an opportunity to answer the phone. The tapping gestures are programable and straightforward, and I have the ability to summon both Alexa and Google's Assistant at any time either by voice or by a long-press. All in all, these are great. I'd say 4.5 stars instead of five, but since I can't do half stars, I feel like these are so good that it's better to round up than down. You honestly can't beat these for the price.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.title: Really Great for the Price

reviews.text: I recently bought the Amazon Echo Buds (3rd Gen) and overall, I’m pretty happy with the sound quality and features. The sound is crisp and clear. However, there’s one thing that really bothers me—the fit. The buds themselves don’t seem to fit securely in my ears. Without the eartips, they don’t seal the ear canal, which affects both sound isolation and overall comfort. Even with the eartips in place, they still feel like they’re not quite the right fit for my ear shape. That said, the Amazon Alexa integration is seamless and works perfectly, and the battery life is solid—lasting through my daily commutes and workouts. If you have a good fit or don't mind occasionally adjusting them, these are great earbuds for the price, but if you have trouble with fit, it might not be the best choice for you.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2025
reviews.title: Great Sound, but the Fit Needs Improvement

title: Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth Headphones 5.4 HiFi Stereo, Ear Buds with 4 ENC Noise Cancelling Mics, 48H Bluetooth Earbuds with Dual LED Display, IP7 Waterproof in Ear Earphones for Android iOS, Black
priceShippingInformation: FREE delivery Monday, September 15 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35 Or Prime members get FREE delivery Tomorrow, September 11. Order within 2 hrs 28 mins. Join Prime
features: Upgraded Bluetooth 5.4 Chip: Featuring the latest Bluetooth 5.4 technology, these wireless earbuds deliver transmission speeds up to 4 Mbps for 2× faster performance and ultra-low latency, so your music and videos stay perfectly in sync. Enjoy a stable connection within 15m (49ft), giving you more freedom to move without dropouts. Once paired for the first time, the earbuds automatically reconnect to your last device for a seamless, hassle-free experience.

Immersive Stereo Sound: The I63 ear buds wireless bluetooth earbuds are equipped with 14.2mm dynamic drivers that deliver a wider audio range with greater depth and detail. Expect crisp highs, rich mids, and deep, punchy bass that bring vocals and instruments to life for a truly immersive listening experience. With support for both stereo and mono modes, you can enjoy full sound with both earbuds or use either earbud independently for added convenience.

Crystal-Clear Calls, Anytime: Equipped with 4 ENC noise-cancelling microphones, these noise cancelling earbuds filter out background noise while keeping your voice crisp and natural, so every call and video chat comes through loud and clear. Perfect for work, travel, or everyday conversations—stay connected without distractions. For all-day comfort, the ear buds come with 3 sizes of soft eartips (S/M/L) to ensure a secure fit and better passive noise isolation.

Extended 48H Playtime with LED Power Display: Enjoy up to 8 hours of listening on a single charge, plus an additional 48 hours with the compact charging case, so your music lasts all day and beyond. The dual LED indicators on the case show the battery levels of both the wireless ear bud and the case at a glance. With a USB-C fast charging port, you’ll get a quicker, safer recharge every time—keeping your soundtrack going without interruption.

Comfortable Fit & IP7 Waterproof: Designed with a compact, pocket-friendly charging case and an ergonomic arc-shaped structure, these bluetooth earphones fit securely and comfortably without pressure, even during running or intense workouts. With an IP7 waterproof rating, they can easily handle sweat, rain, and dust—making them a reliable companion for both daily use and active lifestyles.

Easy Touch Control & Broad Compatibility: Control your music and calls with a simple tap. The intuitive touch controls let you adjust volume, skip tracks, play/pause, answer calls, or activate your voice assistant without reaching for your phone. Perfect for workouts, driving, or running—keep your hands completely free. These in ear headphones are widely compatible with iOS and Android smartphones, laptops, tablets, and even smartwatches, giving you seamless connectivity across all your devices.
productDescription: At AOSRAU, we believe sound is more than what you hear—it’s what you feel. From our very first pair of earphones to today’s advanced Bluetooth line, we’ve stayed true to one mission: bringing technology closer to everyday life. AOSRAU is not just a headphone brand. We are your partner in music, in communication, and in life.

reviews.text: Fantastic sound and fit! I got these during the special Prime sale for $15. I thought for $15 I’d try them…not really needing them or so I thought. I listen in bed a lot with a pair of bone conduction earphones. It does the trick for simple listening to reviews of items and stuff like that but the sound quality is meh. So here are my first impressions. Packaging - this comes in a small box that keeps the earbuds secure and is very easy to open. Once opened you are greeted by very simple instructions that guide you to your Alexa app. Setup - once in the app, it recognizes the earbuds instantly and asks if you want to set them up. I pressed yes and was set up in no time. App - it says that you need an app so I pressed to get that. I was taken to the App Store where I didn’t see an echo buds app but instead the Alexa app that I already had. So I’m not sure if it simply updated the app or what. But it did everything quickly and I was onto the next step. The app is simple to use and lets you adjust the bass, mids and treble - which I instantly used to set it to my preference. I do not like not having an eq for headphones so this was a pleasant surprise. I do wish there were a way to save custom presets so I could quickly change the settings for let’s say pop to classical music. Use - I quickly downloaded Sirius XM and was off to listening to favorite stations in no time ranging from Christian worship to The Beach Boys to Rachmaninoff. The sound was crystal clear and very pleasing. I’m an audio engineering professor and will actually incorporate these into my mixing repertoire as I have the ability to use Bluetooth headphones directly with Pro Tools. These will be perfect to check final mixes on what consumers listen to most now - ear buds. I will toggle between the professional headphones I use and these - which I think will inform my mixing decisions more. Fit - they just fit…this is the first pair of earbuds that I didn’t have to do any Messi by s around with/ just put them on and enjoy…no falling out and they are very comfortable. After wearing them for a few minutes you forget they are on. They can be worn for a long time because of how comfortable they are. Build quality - in addition to seeing professional packaging, it was great to see when I opened it how beautiful the case was. It is sleek and comfortable to hold. Opening the case you are greeted with two stylish earbuds - mine were the black variety. The actual earbuds are very nice looking with a shiny understated black and nice clear silicon that is the many part which grabs the ear Recommendation - I highly recommend these for someone wanting a quality pair of earbuds buds in a decent price range. Even at the full $50 price they are wonderful. I would suspect they compete with earbuds that are more in the $100 range. I will likely compare them to my wife’s AirPods to check differences. I’ve had other EarPods in this price range and I can say these are definitely worlds above. I haven’t even gotten into the phone calling abilities…that next for me to try. But I suspect they will be great for that. They get wonderful reviews from major publishers like PC world. God bless and enjoy your new immersive earbuds!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2025
reviews.title: Fabulous fit and sound - compared to much higher priced buds!

reviews.text: I got these when they first came out and I've had them for about a month now. These are the first wireless earbuds I've ever purchased so I didn't know what to expect but so far I'm pleasantly surprised, especially considering how inexpensive they are. I think the sound is great. I'm not an audiophile by any stretch but I can definitely tell that these have much better sound quality than my wired earbuds. My only complaint from a sound standpoint is occasionally there will be interference or it will cut out. I assume this is just par for the course for something that's wireless / bluetooth, but it can be annoying and there have been a couple of times I needed to reconnect them to clear up an audio problem. It doesn't happen enough for it to be a deal breaker though, and it could just be my phone as it never happens with computer audio. As far as Alexa integration, these work great. I barely have to say "Alexa" above a whisper for the earbuds to activate, which is great when I'm in public and don't want to appear like I'm talking to myself. It also helps if I don't want to trigger one of my nearby Alexa devices, although even if I do, the proximity awareness of echo devices means that if I have my earbuds in, my other echo's won't pick up the command, which is great. From a comfort standpoint, I think my opinion is going to be subjective, after all, everyone's ears are different. I can keep these earbuds in for up to two hours before I need a break. I don't like to keep the earbuds in when I'm not using them so I keep the case in my pocket and take the earbuds out when I'm not using them. That keep my ears from getting tired. I think the battery life is great. Again, I usually only keep them in my ears for around 2 hours, but there have been a couple of times that I've keep them in for 4 to 5 hours and they've almost run completely out of power. In those cases, 15 to 20 minutes in the case and they are good as new. In addition to all this, I really like the features of these earbuds. They were very easy to setup with the Alexa app. They seamlessly connect to my phone and laptop at the same time and I can listen to audio from either device at any time without having to do any type of manual switching. I can be listening to audio on my laptop and if my phone rings, it will pause whatever is playing on my laptop to give me an opportunity to answer the phone. The tapping gestures are programable and straightforward, and I have the ability to summon both Alexa and Google's Assistant at any time either by voice or by a long-press. All in all, these are great. I'd say 4.5 stars instead of five, but since I can't do half stars, I feel like these are so good that it's better to round up than down. You honestly can't beat these for the price.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.title: Really Great for the Price

reviews.text: I recently bought the Amazon Echo Buds (3rd Gen) and overall, I’m pretty happy with the sound quality and features. The sound is crisp and clear. However, there’s one thing that really bothers me—the fit. The buds themselves don’t seem to fit securely in my ears. Without the eartips, they don’t seal the ear canal, which affects both sound isolation and overall comfort. Even with the eartips in place, they still feel like they’re not quite the right fit for my ear shape. That said, the Amazon Alexa integration is seamless and works perfectly, and the battery life is solid—lasting through my daily commutes and workouts. If you have a good fit or don't mind occasionally adjusting them, these are great earbuds for the price, but if you have trouble with fit, it might not be the best choice for you.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2025
reviews.title: Great Sound, but the Fit Needs Improvement

reviews.text: When I say so far, I mean I only got it today so I haven't been able to test the longevity of the charge or its durability over time. But for this price, what I have experienced so far is impressive. It was charged fully in 2.5 hours. Probably before that but I didn't check. They are very light and comfortable over the ears. My ears are very sensitive to any kind of prolonged pressure and some headphones like airpods are just impossible for me to wear. Even ones I do consider bearable start to hurt after a short period of time. These felt almost like nothing. Despite their comfort, even without music playing they provided a quiet experience. I had the TV on and could barely hear it with the headphones on. It was very easy to pair (it took a few seconds but did so effortlessly) and the controls are fairly intuitive. The cord may come in handy in the future, so it was a nice bonus. I also liked the left/right labelling, as it does make a difference and it's usually indicated in the tiniest letters possible, if at all. This made it simple and straightforward to don. I found there is a definite difference in sound using the equalizer presets, though for my taste the Pop equalizer sounded the best for pretty much all genres of music, ranging from opera to punk and a lot of stuff in between. Sound quality was far better than I anticipated from a $20 headset, certainly on par with those I have spent a lot more money on. If you are looking for inexpensive and GOOD headphones that don't hurt your head and effectively block out noise without the label and price of "noise-cancelling" this is your huckleberry.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2025
reviews.title: Seems amazing so far :)

reviews.text: These headphones are really light weight and comfortable, with some nice quality of life features. The left and right sides are marked clearly on the outside and in much larger R/L's on the inside of each ear. The adjustable size parts of the headband have settings they settle into with markings on them so you can set it the same amount on each side. The distance of the bluetooth connection is pretty far, I walked out of my bedroom, down a short hallway into my kitchen and it was still playing with only occasional cutting out. There was a closet and a small bathroom between me and my paired computer. There is a noticeable delay in the sound when gaming when using it with bluetooth, but that's just how that works of course. Not an audiophile or pro gamer, works great for music and minecraft. They stay on snug even when I whip my head side to side with just a little movement in place, and aren't too tight. I have pretty sensitive skin and it doesn't feel uncomfortable after wearing for a couple hours, though I do feel the pressure on my ears a bit after taking them off. The sound isolation is good too, not active noise canceling but makes everything much quieter, and with music playing at pretty mild volume it can be difficult to make out what someone right in front of you is saying. I don't know what the different sound modes really do or when I personally would want to switch to them, so I just keep it set to classic. To turn them on hold the multi function button for a 2 seconds, then to turn them off hold the button for 4 seconds. From off you enter pairing mode by holding the button for 4 seconds, and after pairing it to my pc it connects when I turn on the headphones. The instructions gave the name of the headphones to find on the list when checking discoverable bluetooth devices on my computer. This came with an aux cord and a charging cable, usb-c to usb-a. the cords aren't super long but they work for charging and connecting to my speakers if I want to listen in wired mode. I would probably want to use a longer aux cable if I wasn't just using bluetooth, so it could connect to the desktop tower itself at the back to avoid the static from my speakers.

globalReviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about these Bluetooth headphones—they're everything I wanted and more! From the moment I unboxed them, I was obsessed. Battery Life: First off, the battery life is unreal. I swear, I charged them once and they lasted for days (like, actual DAYS). Whether I'm working out, commuting, or just binging podcasts, they never die on me. No more constant recharging or losing audio mid-song—just hours and hours of reliable playtime. Performance: The sound quality is super crisp and clear, with just the right amount of bass. Calls are crystal-clear too, and the Bluetooth connection is rock solid—no lag, no random dropouts. They also pair in seconds, which is a huge plus. Design & Colors: Okay, let’s talk about the colors—so cute! 😍 Whether you're into soft pastels, bold brights, or sleek neutrals, there's something for every vibe. I got the lavender pair and I get compliments every single time I wear them. They're stylish and comfortable, with a snug, lightweight fit that doesn’t hurt even after hours of wear. Overall: These headphones are the perfect mix of form, function, and flair. Long battery life? Check. Great sound? Check. Aesthetic that matches your personality? Double check. I’m already thinking about getting a second pair in a different color just because I love them that much.

globalReviews.text: These are really great headphones and not just for the price. I am not an audiophile by any means, but, IMO, the sound quality is incredible. The battery lasts forever (at least 3 days and I use them all the time). They connect super easily to whatever device you need it to and it will connect to 2 devices at the same time. They are also super durable. I have a big head so I can't tell you how many times I have cracked headphone spreading them open to get them around my ears. I've had these for 5 months and that is the longest I've had a pair of headphone without that happening. They are also super comfortable. I wear them for hours at a time and never feel like I have to take them of because they are grating me or squeezing my head to hard. And finally, they don't easily slip off your head. If you shake your head hard enough, obviously they will fall off. But they won't fall if you do something as innocuous as bend forward (that has happened to me a lot with other pairs of headphones). Could not recommend these headphones more.

reviews.text: I've been using these headphones literally every day for more than a year, and they're still performing extremely well. They reliably and consistently connect to my devices. When I power these headphones up, I simply know that they're going to connect. Not so with my previous headphones that cost nearly as much. With my previous headphones (that did not have any noise cancellation feature), it was a roll of the dice every time I wanted to connect to my devices. Sometimes I would have to cycle them 2 or 3 times just to get them to connect. The build quality is excellent. Battery life is also very good...diminished somewhat if the noise cancelling feature is enabled. They're also comfortable to wear for hours on end. I would definitely buy these headphones again. They're a very good value. Although I rarely use it, the noise cancellation feature is robust, especially for mid-range frequencies. A characteristic of any noise-cancellation technology is a slight sensation of over-pressure, but it's not objectionable. It's most noticeable when the noise cancellation feature is first enabled, and again when it's switched off. I highly recommend these headphones for daily use.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.title: Excellent Overall Quality and Value

reviews.text: Back in 2019 I purchased the TaoTronics SoundSurge 46 headphones and I love them. They're no longer for sale on Amazon and they Toatronics US won't send their headphones overseas, so I ordered a these ZIHNIC headphones as a possible replacement as the earpads have fallen off and disintergrated. I really like them. The sound is great, although a tad boomy but that can be a good thing depending on the music you like. My only complaint is that the Bluetooth range/distance is really poor and I dearly would love to find a pair as good as these or the taotronics that has the range the taotronics had. The ZIHNIC's start to lose the connection even at 5m sometimes and you'd be lucky to get 15m in a straight line before losing the connection completely. With the Taotronics I could be 100m line of sight and still have a great connection. Or be 20m away and behind two steel shed walls and still get a connection. They're tough and the noise cancelling is great but not quite as good as the Taotronics. Close enough though. So if anyone knows of a set of bluetooth (preferably 5.0+) headphones please recommended them. If you're sitting close to the bluetooth transmitter with the ZIHNIC's then they're ideal. Great for the price. And battery life is fantastic but I do tend to top them up at least every two days.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2022
reviews.title: Bluetootch distance/range/connectivity

reviews.text: Of course these are not in the same league as the top noise cancelling headphones from Bose, Sennheiser, etc. And for a fraction of the price they shouldn't be expected to be. That said, so far they're a very good value for what they cost. Sound quality and bass are very good. Battery life is good- I can work all day with music and the noise cancelling turned on. Build quality seems pretty good for normal use- I don't blast music or abuse them. The noise cancelling is okay- only 'takes the edge off' loud noises but doesn't cancel them completely. But with that and music I can work from home and tune out the kids making noise. I would buy them again.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2022
reviews.title: Surprisingly good for the price

reviews.text: Sound quality is good with a lot of bass. Integrated microphone is not the best but decent enough to make calls The noise cancelling works great and is reducing background noise greatly however it makes some white noise, which is not really important when you are in a noisy environement thus the button to activate and deactivate the noise canceling is a nice addition. This comes with a jack connector and cable, I am able to plug it in the entertainment system during flight. I had seats near the jet engine, kids .. and the noise canceling is perfect for those situations plus the audio is much better than any headsets handed out during flights
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2022
reviews.title: Must have for Airplaine travel

reviews.text: I bought this cool headset a few weeks ago, and it's working quite well. I love the metallic surface design and I think it looks very cool. In terms of performance, it's definitely comparable to other high end brands with good noise cancellation. The low frequency bass sound kicks in pretty nicely. It is adjustable on the length, and it fits well with my ears. It's wireless and I often sync it with my phone to listen to the music while I'm running on the treadmill. Given the low price, I would say this is a pretty good deal.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2021
reviews.title: Very Cool Headset

reviews.text: I got this because I was having trouble hearing audio while on flights. I am sure that they do not work as well as the $200-300 sets that are sold but they seem to work quite well for me. I can hear audio without having to strain and the noise cancellation reduces the background noise sufficiently. The battery life is quite robust and they charge up quickly. The carrying case is nice and I don't worry about them breaking in my backpack. I only use these a couple hours a month and so they were well worth the money for me.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2022
reviews.title: Seems to work well

reviews.text: These worked well and the sound was decent but the ear cups were so damn shallow. My ears are about average size and they were smashed in the cup. If you've got average ears or worse, some Dumbo ears, I would not recommend these. Now apart from that, the sound quality was alright, but not quite what I was looking for with respect of the minds highs and overall bass. Also, the top of these felt like they were digging into my head so I'm gong to have to send these back.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2021
reviews.title: Seemed to be made for kids.

reviews.text: the noise canceling is a little weak. I just play grey noise when I need silence. The sound quality is good for music. Price was right. Nice product over all, satisfied customer.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022

智慧型噪音控制:我們的入耳式耳塞提供專業級降噪功能。 主動降噪 (ANC) 可阻擋高達 45 dB 的環境噪音,即使在地鐵等嘈雜的空間也能享受身臨其境的音效。 Transparency 模式可讓您清晰聆聽周圍環境,而無需取下耳塞 - 在需要時保持警覺和安全。
卓越的聲音和清晰的通話:這些真正的無線耳機具有 13 公釐精確驅動器和定制的聲學腔體,可提供深沉、強勁的低音、自然平衡的中音和閃閃發光的高音,以提供錄音室品質的音頻。 輕鬆切換五個專業 EQ 預設,以完美匹配任何音樂類型,而雙 ENC 麥克風具有先進的降噪功能,可消除多達 98% 的背景噪音 - 無論您是在通勤、工作或進行激烈的鍛煉,都能保持通話清晰清晰。
長達 40 小時的電池壽命:我們的藍牙耳機提供 8 小時的播放時間 - 使用充電盒可延長至 40 小時。 充電盒內建 LED 電池指示燈讓您隨時了解;10 分鐘快速充電可額外播放 2 小時,讓您全天享受不間斷的音樂。
藍牙 6.0 提供快速穩定的連接:這些藍牙 6.0 耳塞提供即時的一步配對,並保持穩定的連接。 憑藉超低延遲和強大的抗干擾設計,即使在擁擠的環境中,您也可以享受無延遲的遊戲、流暢的視頻流和清晰的通話體驗。
全天舒適和 IPX7 防水:這些藍牙耳機採用人體工學形狀,可貼合您的耳朵,幾乎沒有貼合-並配有三種不同的耳塞選項,即使是在較小的耳朵上也能確保完美的密封。 謹慎且超輕,提供您幾乎忘記穿著的舒適度。 IPX7 防水等級,在激烈的鍛煉或下雨的通勤期間,它們可以站立出汗和飛濺。

reviews.text: I’m seriously impressed with these earbuds! The sound quality is excellent—clear highs, solid mids, and surprisingly powerful bass for such a compact pair. The real standout feature, though, is the case. Having a built-in screen makes it so much easier to check battery levels, track charging progress, and even manage basic settings without guessing or pulling out my phone. The earbuds themselves are lightweight, comfortable for long listening sessions, and they stay secure even during workouts. The connection is fast and stable, and the touch controls are super responsive. Battery life is great, and being able to see the exact percentage on the screen is a game-changer compared to just blinking lights. Overall, these feel like a premium product at a very reasonable price. If you want high-quality earbuds with a smart, futuristic touch, this is absolutely worth it.

title: Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth 5.4 Headphones Sports, 50H Playback Over-Ear Buds with ENC Noise Cancelling Mic, Deep Bass Fitness Earphones with Earhooks, IP7 Waterproof Headset for Running, Blue
priceShippingInformation: FREE delivery Monday, September 15 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35 Or Prime members get FREE delivery Tomorrow, September 11. Order within 1 hr 27 mins. Join Prime
features: Hi-Fi Sound Quality and HD Clear Calls: Bluetooth earbuds feature a 4-sound chamber design with 14.2mm graphene drivers, which are 30% larger than conventional types, to increase the audio frequency by 70% (18Hz-25kHz), delivering transparent highs and immersive bass. These ENC noise-cancelling wireless earbuds are equipped with four high-definition microphones, which boost vocal clarity by 75% and cut external noise by 80%, making sure your voice comes through loud and clear during calls.

Bluetooth 5.4 and Dual-Use Mode: Equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.4 chip, wireless earphones deliver high-quality, lossless audio coding and support HFP, A2DP, HSP, and AVRCP. Compared to Bluetooth 5.3, they offer faster transfer speeds, 45% lower power consumption, and 35ms lower latency, with a stable transmission range of 50 feet. Earbuds feature a dual-use mode: binaural mode for immersive stereo sound and mono mode, which allows you to enjoy music solo or share an earpiece with others.

60H Playback and Digital Charging Case: Bluetooth earbuds deliver up to 60 hours of total playtime with the charging case. Each earbud provides 8 hours of playback per charge, and the case can recharge the earbuds six times. A 10-minute fast charge via USB-C supplies an additional 2 hours of playtime. The earbuds are equipped with a dual LED digital display. During charging, the LED lights flash to indicate the charging progress, displaying the battery percentage from 1% to 100%.

Ergonomic Sports Design and IP7 Waterproof: The sport headphones feature flexible, soft, and ergonomic 45° ear hooks, ensuring a secure fit during intense workouts. They come with three sizes of ear tips (S, M, L) for a customized and comfortable fit. The headphones also have an IP7 waterproof nano-coating on internal components, making them resistant to sweat, rain, and accidental water exposure. This design makes them highly suitable for gym sessions, workouts, and running.

Wide Compatibility and Smart Touch Control: The wireless ear buds, equipped with a hall effect sensor, automatically power on and reconnect to the last paired device simply by opening the case after initial pairing. These sport headphones are compatible with a wide range of devices, including smartphones, TVs, computers, and laptops. Bluetooth earphones also feature intuitive touch controls on the earbuds for play/pause, volume adjustments, call management, and voice assistant activation.

globalReviews.text: Ich habe mir seinerzeit diese Sportkopfhörer in schwarz zugelegt. Da ich damit mehr als sehr zufrieden bin, habe ich sie jetzt auch meiner Frau in lila gekauft. Ich trage die Kopfhörer am Tag mehrere Stunden und habe bisher nie irgendwelche unangenehmen Druckgefühle. Sie sitzen beim Sport fest im Ohr und Außengeräusche sind so gut wie gar nicht wahrnehmbar, egal bei welcher Lautstärke. Es liegen drei Paar Stopfen aus Silikon in verschiedenen Größen bei. Der Sound ist sehr klar, die Bässe sind kräftig. Die Sensortechnik für die Steuerung ist einfach zu handhaben und sicher. Ich benutze die Kopfhörer regelmäßig beim Duschen und hatte bisher nie Probleme damit. Sobald die Kopfhörer aus dem Case entnommen werden, verbinden sie sich problemlos und schnell mit dem Smartphone und anderen Geräten. Die Reichweite ist erstaunlich hoch. Zeitweise liegt mein Smartphone im Erdgeschoss und ich befinde mich im ersten Stock. Über die Laufzeit kann ich nicht viel berichten. Ich schätze sie Pi mal Daumen auf ca. 6 Stunden. Meist benutze ich nur eine Kopfhörerseite und wechsle sie, wenn sie leer wird. Über Sprache wird in englischer Sprache u.a. mitgeteilt, wenn der Akku schwach ist. Die Ladezeit für die Kopfhörer oder das Case schätze ich auf ca. 30-45 Minuten. Es kommt sicherlich auch darauf an, welcher Ladeadapter benutzt wird. Es dauert länger, wenn gänzlich alles leer ist. Alles in allem bin ich begeistert vom Preis-Leistungsverhältnis und der Qualität. Hoher Tragekomfort, toller Sound, eine einfache Bedienung und eine stabile Verbindung. Sollten meine Kopfhörer irgendwann einmal den Geist aufgeben, werde ich mir dieses Produkt wieder zulegen.
globalReviews.title: Tolle Sportkopfhörer

globalReviews.text: Je cherchais des écouteurs pour faire du sport car mes anciens n'arrêtaient pas de glisser avec la transpiration, c'était vraiment agaçant ! Avec ces écouteurs Matast C16, le problème est réglé. Ils tiennent super bien en place, même quand je transpire beaucoup pendant mes séances. La qualité est vraiment correcte pour le prix, franchement je m'attendais pas à ça vu le tarif très accessible. Le son est bon, l'isolation acoustique fait son travail et la connexion Bluetooth se fait sans souci. La couleur rose pêche est sympa aussi ! Bref, je recommande si vous cherchez des écouteurs qui bougent pas pendant le sport sans vous ruiner. Ça fait le travail parfaitement !
globalReviews.title: Parfait pour le sport !

features: 2X Stronger Voice Reduction: Stay focused during bustling journeys with our upgraded noise cancelling structure. Space One excels in blocking out mid to high-frequency sounds with 2X more* voice reduction. *Compared with soundcore Life Q30 headphones.

Reduce Noise By Up to 98%*: Adaptive noise cancelling detects external sounds and sound leakage, auto-calibrating to deliver optimal noise reduction. Escape unwanted distractions, whether you're on a noisy train, in a bustling café, or your headphones aren't sitting on your ears properly. *Tested by soundcore under laboratory conditions.

Journey with Hi-Res Audio: Space One's 40mm customized dynamic drivers support LDAC for Hi-Res Wireless audio, delivering 3X more detail than standard Bluetooth codecs for detail-rich listening without any tangled wires.
40 Hours of ANC Playtime: Embark on blissful journeys with 40 hours of playtime with ANC on. 55 hours of continuous music with ANC off ensures endless entertainment without battery concerns.

Crafted for Comfort and Style: Elegantly designed, 8° rotating ear cups effortlessly conform to the contours of any head, and a soft integrated headband evenly distributes pressure for natural prolonged wear.

reviews.text: I've been all over the place with trying to figure out what to use for listening to my music while at the gym. I've tried earbuds and the primary issue is being able to keep them in place while I'm doing various activities. Inevitably, they always....I mean always...come loose, lose their ideal placement for optimal sound and I need to re-establish them. Needless to say...I'm not dealing with that. I even bought a pair that was supposedly one of the best...never lost their seating, etc. Returned after one gym session. BTW...I'm not doing crazy gymnastic stuff...basic use of equipment, walking on treadmill, stairclimber and recumbent bike. I am just getting back to the gym and a few years ago used a 'cheapo' on ear headphone set that I essentially viewed as 'throw-away'. It worked fine and sure enough, the covering got to a point from sweating they were no longer functional. So...that's where I was kinda going w/my decision-making this time. Even though I toyed w/the idea of buying a better headphone set...good brand w/good reputation that also had the option of replacing the earpads. Then I found these headphones. I wanted something that would provide decent sound quality. Check....not as good as my 'good travel headphones' but definitely better than buds, and good enough for 1.5 hours of gym time. They were advertised as lightweight and comfortable....check. Barely notice they are on. Value for the money....check. Paid about $20 for these!! Bluetooth connection and charging time vs playback is excellent. This is absolutely all I need while doing my 'gym thing'. If I were to have one 'gripe', it's the wish of having noise cancellation feature. I thought that the ambient gym noise...regular hub-bub and their own music, would be negated by the earpads and music. Yes, for the most part it does negate it, but would be a heckuva lot better to not have music quite so high for my hearing....yes...getting a tad older and that's becoming a greater concern. Otherwise, if you're thinking about these headphones, no need to debate....I wouldn't hesitate.

reviews.title: Wonderful!

reviews.text: I use these at work, around the house, and with my PlayStation. They have fantastic quality and the ANC is very effective. My main reason for purchasing was ANC for in the office. I work two days a week in an open office setting which can lead to some very frustrating distractions. I looked at a few other brands and landed on these ones because of the price tag. Since my team is based all over the country, I do spend a lot of time on Teams calls. Here's a few observations: - I feel like there's some noticeable lag time when I'm connected via Bluetooth. It's not bad or even disruptive, you just notice it and gotta get used to it. - Connecting to two devices at once is HUGE. I frequently start a Teams meeting on my laptop and transfer it to my phone, not needing to disconnect bluetooth on one device and then on another is so nice. - Sound quality is great. I have not heard anyone complain about my mic/audio quality. - Very comfortable, but they are also hot. It's like wearing a winter puffer jacket suctioned to your ears. - I get a full work day of use out of them. They charge quickly, I can usually get them back to a high battery life during my drive home.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2025
reviews.title: Great for the price

reviews.text: I love using their app to volume control. I can tweak some settings to my liking. My fav is bass boosted, it’s because I’m a bass head. I also use Increase bass on my Apple Music EQ. It works perfectly fine. The battery life is incredible. It’s well worth it. I got on sale I believe for $79.99. The ear protection is perfect for people with glasses and the earbuds are super comfortable. As soon as I boot it up on the fresh opening, it connects quite easily. Overall I would give this a 10/10. Kudos to you Soundcore! Please keep making great products for people like me and millions of others! Thank you for taking the time to read my review. P. S. I love that it matches my blue Chromebook and blue iPhone 16!!!

globalReviews.text: I am not an audiophile and this product is very good midrange headphones. I use it during travelling and ANC is reasonably good for me. They are comfortable and have good sound quality. Highly recommend if you are on a budget. Only thing that can be better if it had a hardcase was included in the box.

For the price of $120, by using coupons and buying it during EOFY, these headphones have provided great value both in sound and build quality, in my opinion. I have been using it for a few months, both at home and during my university trips. I must say that the noise cancelling is at a satisfactory standard, as on trains, you won't hear the constant rumbling of train tracks and the numerous conversations around you. It becomes better if you play music with that mode on. The most notable feature is that Soundcore has an app in which you can connect your headphones, and it has numerous features. Personal EQ settings, theme settings, and hearing adjustment (if your old). The music quality is great overall, but I have noticed that it gets a bit rough if you go above maybe 80% volume, as the clarity goes down. Multi-point is a good bonus if you like to switch between devices consistently, it is a convenient feature for me as I often switch between my laptop and phone.

The battery life is impressive, and customers consider them good value for money. The functionality receives mixed reviews - while the ANC works well for work calls, some customers report one side stopping working. The build quality also gets mixed feedback, with some finding it sturdy while others describe it as flimsy.
